sentence: I doubt Pence's comments would have caused the stir they did if it weren't for the fact that earlier in the day the Republican National Committee had voted to censure Reps. Adam Kinzinger, R-Ill., and Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., at the RNC's winter meeting in Utah.
author: Heather Digby Parton
title: Mike Pence finally speaks up  too late! Trump's takeover of GOP is virtually complete
